author: jessepollak
content:
Thanks everyone for attending. Full notes are here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/15EatedrJanNxBZGPVASvwq9xgbTs5UxjsDfjpM6ppSY/edit#.

**Overall goal by next week is to have all the spec PRs merged and to align on a scope for Devnet 3.**

Specific action items:

[Ansgar] Set minimum fee to 1 wei, open new PR to discuss what constant should be, merge the existing PR request
[Ansgar / Dankrad] Open new PR to let the point evaluation precompile output the modulus
[Tim] Confirm +1 to Terrence on and coupling blocks and blobs and the reduction to 18 days
[Tim] Bring up Rebase EIP-4844 on Capella on CL call next week
[Tim] Figure out offline how to best get Rust and Nim bindings done

Feel free to ask questions
